title: TravelStyle
description: Travel preference style or pace - defines the TYPE and PACE of travel, NOT the budget

changes: Fixed schema mismatch: added Adventure and Relaxation
Aligned with iOS app travelStyles array
changelog.migration: If using Mid-range, map to Comfortable. If using Ultra-Luxury, map to Luxury.

notes: IMPORTANT: This is different from budget
TravelStyle controls PACE and TYPE (fast-paced vs slow, active vs restful)
Adventure and Relaxation are ONLY valid for travelStyle, NOT budget
Mid-range and Ultra-Luxury are ONLY valid for budget, NOT travelStyle

semantics.Budget: Budget-conscious travel style with basic accommodations
